Package sledgehammer.event.player

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AliveEvent
    Event that is sent when a Player is marked 'Alive'.
    CheaterEvent
    PlayerEvent to handle activated cheat detections in the Sledgehammer engine and the PZ server.
    ClientEvent
    PlayerEvent that handles Lua-Client communication with LuaNet.
    ConnectEvent
    PlayerEvent that is passed when a Player connected to the PZ server.
    CoOpAccessEvent
    CoOpEvent to handle Access requests to the PZ server.
    CoOpEvent
    Abstract Event to identify the subset of Co-Op related Events fired in the PZ server and sent to the Sledgehammer engine.
    DeathEvent
    PlayerEvent to pass when a Player dies.
    DisconnectEvent
    PlayerEvent to pass when a Player disconnects from the PZ Server.
    HandShakeEvent
    PlayerEvent to handle dispatching the SledgehammerLua handshake with the Sledgehammer engine and the registered Modules listening for the HandshakeEvent.
    PlayerChatReadyEvent  
    PlayerCreatedEvent
    PlayerEvent sent when a Player is created.
    PlayerEvent
    Abstract Event that associates a Player with Player-oriented Events in the Sledgehammer engine.
    PlayerInfoEvent
    PlayerEvent that handles the transmission of a Players position, and meta-position.
    PlayerJoinEvent  
    PlayerQuitEvent  
    PreConnectEvent
    Event that is passed when a Player attempts to connect to the PZ server.
